body_html:
@poxvoculi This is a corner stone of the current verbs design, where the receiving side could make multiple Recv attempts. Since the pinned memory is shared, a single Recv attempt may not be successful if the shared memory is used by other transmission.

But no worries, let us see if we can do without it.

But no worries, let us see if we can do without it.
body:
@poxvoculi This is a corner stone of the current verbs design, where the receiving side could make multiple Recv attempts. Since the pinned memory is shared, a single Recv attempt may not be successful if the shared memory is used by other transmission.

But no worries, let us see if we can do without it.
